/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, trees stand tall, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The colors in the image are rich and vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky creating a striking contrast.
